Posts.Content: Jan 14, 2014 10:30PM Kimberly1414 wrote: Thank you wonderful ladies for all your advice.  This is such a hard time so its nice to know there are people out there that can help.  My mum is on her last two cycles of her chemo and is not doing so well.  They are talking about giving her a blood transfusion.  I didn't think that was something that even happened for cancer patients.  She is petty scared and so am I to be honest.  After that she will be switching to oral chemo but at this time I do not know exactly which ones.
Posts.Title: Intravenous chemo to oral chemo Kimberly1414 Kimberly1414
